aftermath and awakening work fine, but genesis freezes everytime. i tried powerdvd and vlcplayer, same problem. with bsplayer i got it to play, but it plays like 1fps :(

anyone having the same problem?
IMO, these two movies aren't even worth downloading. WAY over-hyped. Do yourself a favor, and skip this one. I wish I had. It's just two short films with no dialog, and they aren't that good anyways.
